text: Backlash (2009) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). It took place on April 26, 2009 at the Dunkin' Donuts Center in Providence, Rhode Island. It was the eleventh Backlash event held by WWE and the last to take place yearly. Backlash was replaced by Extreme Rules in 2010, but returned in 2016. ==Results== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Kofi Kingston defeated Dolph Ziggler Singles match N/A 2 Christian defeated Jack Swagger (c) Singles match for the ECW Championship 10:55 3 Chris Jericho defeated Ricky Steamboat Singles match 12:32 4 Kane defeated CM Punk Singles match 9:25 5 Jeff Hardy defeated Matt Hardy "I Quit" match 19:01 6 Santina Marella defeated Beth Phoenix Singles match for the title of "Miss WrestleMania" 0:03 7 The Legacy (Randy Orton, Cody Rhodes and Ted DiBiase) defeated Triple H (c), Batista and Shane McMahon Six-Man Tag Team match for the WWE Championship 22:50 8 Edge defeated John Cena (c) Last Man Standing match for the World Heavyweight Championship 28:25 == References == == Other websites == *Official Website Category:2009 in professional wrestling Category:WWE Backlash Category:2009 in the United States Category:2000s in Rhode Island Category:April 2009 events Category:History of Providence, Rhode Island
title: Backlash (2009)
